daily.text: By fundamentally changing how we design the places and systems that enable our daily lives, we can slash emissions way beyond the immediate carbon savings - because our own personal emissions are just the tip of a vast iceberg of energy and resources consumed far from our view.
daily.author: Alex Steffen

daily.text: Peace is a daily, a weekly, a monthly process, gradually changing opinions, slowly eroding old barriers, quietly building new structures.
daily.author: John F. Kennedy

daily.text: God does not die on the day when we cease to believe in a personal deity, but we die on the day when our lives cease to be illumined by the steady radiance, renewed daily, of a wonder, the source of which is beyond all reason.
daily.author: Dag Hammarskjold

daily.text: Many use the word “Kingdom” flippantly. Even though we sing about it in our praise songs, we talk about it in our sermons, yet we seem to still not understand its reality in our daily lives.
daily.author: Sunday Adelaja

daily.text: The Civil Rights Act of 1964 laid the foundation for the Voting Rights Act of 1965, but it also addressed nearly every other aspect of daily life in a would-be free democratic society.
daily.author: Aberjhani

daily.text: In the morning, I use a Philosophy cleanser and Olay Regenerist Daily 3 Point Treatment Cream, which sinks in well and feels firming. I rarely wear foundation, so cotton wool soaked in warm water is often enough to cleanse at night, but I take off eye make-up with Klorane's cornflower-infused remover.
daily.author: Saffron Aldridge

daily.text: It used to upset me - now it makes me sad - to see people use patriotism and our troops as a pawn in their political argument. Because I know personally, growing up in a military family, the sacrifice that is made on a daily basis.
daily.author: Tamron Hall

daily.text: When you dare to dream, dare to follow that dream; dare to suffer through the pain, sacrifice, self-doubts and friction from the world.
daily.author: Laura Schlessinger

daily.text: Making better choices takes work. There is a daily give and take, but it is worth the effort.
daily.author: Tom Rath

daily.text: Don’t play for safety. It’s the most dangerous thing in the world.
daily.author: Hugh Walpole

daily.text: And that's really what's happening in this country is a violation of the First Commandment. We have become a country entrenched in idolatry, and that idolatry is the dependency upon our government. We're supposed to depend upon God for our protection and our provision and for our daily bread, not for our government.
daily.author: Sharron Angle

daily.text: Failure is a sign post, directing the right road for life’s journey.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: You have to write down what you really want to do in this life and then you have to write down what you have to do every day to achieve the goal.
daily.author: Sunday Adelaja

daily.text: There lay certitude; there, in the daily round.  All the rest hung on mere threads and trivial contingencies; you couldn't waste your time on it. The thing was to do your job as it should be done.
daily.author: Albert Camus

daily.text: Many losses have gone sinking daily by our inability to recognize the great deal of power reserved in us. Watch out and make it real because soon, it's going to be your turn to shine!
daily.author: Israelmore Ayivor

daily.text: Teaching does allow me to keep one foot in the youthful waters I tend to occupy in my novels, so I'm thankful for that. My students also remind me on a daily basis that the stories I collected during my district attorney days are actually interesting to people who haven't had that experience.
daily.author: Alafair Burke

daily.text: My hope fuels my determination to overcome any difficulty.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: The search for justice and security, the struggle for equality of opportunity, the quest for tolerance and harmony, the pursuit of human dignity - these are moral imperatives which we must work towards and think about on a daily basis.
daily.author: Aga Khan IV

daily.text: I never wanted to be a celebrity; I never wanted to be famous. And in my daily life, I work really hard to not trade on it in any way.
daily.author: Sarah Jessica Parker

daily.text: Grace abounds for everyday life.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: In every day, there are 1,440 minutes. That means we have 1,440 daily opportunities to make a positive impact.
daily.author: Les Brown

daily.text: You can capable of heroic deeds. Think well of yourself and act positively.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: People spend their lives in the service of their passions instead of employing their passions in the service of their lives.
daily.author: Richard Steele

daily.text: I found that dance, music, and literature is how I made sense of the world... It pushed me to think of things bigger than life's daily routines... To think beyond what is immediate or convenient.
daily.author: Mikhail Baryshnikov

daily.text: Coming up with a useful, meaningful quote is getting more and more challenging each day....And you can quote me on that.
daily.author: Bobby Darnell

daily.text: We ought to seek daily grace.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: Until you prove what is in you, what is in you shall always be what is in you.
daily.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

daily.text: When the brain becomes too tired, the mind stops decrypting the perceptions in our mental world and surrenders willingly to the unguarded moments of life.For some time, the safeguards of our thinking pattern weaken and discontinue the decoding of the chips of daily reality.The mind picks the instants which are above suspicion, pure and innocent. ('Uber alle Gipfeln ist Ruh' ).
daily.author: Erik Pevernagie

wanderlust.text: I don't know where I am going, I just know I had to leave. Everything I was I carry with me, everything I will be lies waiting on the road ahead.
wanderlust.author: Ma Jian

wanderlust.text: I dont live in a fantasy; just a dream, that's to hard for some to believe.
wanderlust.author: Nikki Rowe

wanderlust.text: ..Luxury is the enemy of observation, a costly indulgence that induces such a good feeling that you notice nothing. Luxury spoils and infantilizes you and prevents you from knowing the world. That is its purpose, the reason why luxury cruises and great hotels are full of fatheads who, when they express an opinion, seem as though they are from another planet. It was also my experience that one of the worst aspects of travelling with wealthy people, apart from the fact that the rich never listen, is that they constantly groused about the high cost of living – indeed, the rich usually complained of being poor.
wanderlust.author: Paul Theroux

wanderlust.text: The geographical pilgrimage is the symbolic acting out an inner journey. The inner journey is the interpolation of the meanings and signs of the outer pilgrimage. One can have one without the other. It is best to have both.
wanderlust.author: Thomas Merton

wanderlust.text: Travel is costly yes, but it pays dividends too.
wanderlust.author: Aaron Lauritsen

wanderlust.text: You have to keep doing it, Even if no one is watching. The best artists, are those Who live from their expressions, Not chasing the impressions.
wanderlust.author: Nikki Rowe

wanderlust.text: And we laugh and laugh andall I know isat this moment I feel likeI can do anything I wantand be anyone I wantand go anywhere on the globeand still call it home.
wanderlust.author: Kirsten Smith

wanderlust.text: She's an old soul with young eyes, a vintage heart, and a beautiful mind.
wanderlust.author: Nicole Lyons

wanderlust.text: I keep going backas if I'm looking for something I have lostback to the motherland, sisterland, fatherlandback to the beacon, the breastthe smell and taste of the breeze,and the singing of the rain.
wanderlust.author: Heather Nova

wanderlust.text: And if travel is like love, it is, in the end, mostly because it’s a heightened state of awareness, in which we are mindful, receptive, in dimmed by familiarity and ready to be transformed. That is why the best trips, like the best love affairs, never really end.
wanderlust.author: Pico Iyer

wanderlust.text: Nostalgia in reverse, the longing for yet another strange land, grew especially strong in spring.
wanderlust.author: Vladimir Nabokov

wanderlust.text: I'm sorry! I really am! I wanted to get out of this place! I want to live! I want to get away from here and never see it again! I hate everything about it!'You will hate the next place, too,' I said. 'What you are you will carry with you.
wanderlust.author: Louis L'Amour

wanderlust.text: It might be well enough to wander if you've a place and people to come back to, but I tell you now there's no desolation like wanting to go home and truly not knowing where it is.
wanderlust.author: Elizabeth Kerner

wanderlust.text: And you must not worry about me. You must follow your dreams. You have your life ahead of you. I am just a wanderer passing by.
wanderlust.author: Avijeet Das

wanderlust.text: From centuries ago before the dawn of civilization, I have been wandering. I am the wanderer. I can't stay at one place. I am destined to wander from place to place!And I keep wandering in search of a nothingness. The river embraces me and guides me to swim inside her and to drink the nectar of love from her bosom. She tells me her secrets and I tell her mine. She makes me sensitive and soft.The mountain greets me with respect and guides me to traverse the rocks and crevices of its body! He is strong and vigorous and he appreciates my stamina and toughness.After dusk in the night, the stars smile at me and they show me light to travel in the darkness. They tell me their stories and I tell them mine.The moon embalms me with her love and she kisses me good night. The nightingale sings her song of love when I take rest in the arms of darkness in the night!And after the dawn of the morning, the sun greets me and acknowledges my spirit and strength!I am the wanderer and I keep wandering in search of a nothingness.I am the wanderer and wandering is my destiny!
wanderlust.author: Avijeet Das

wanderlust.text: Explore, Experience, Then Push Beyond.
wanderlust.author: Aaron Lauritsen

wanderlust.text: I will never lose the love for the arriving, but I'm born to leave.
wanderlust.author: Charlotte Eriksson

wanderlust.text: Will I ever get over the pull I feel to both of these places?
wanderlust.author: Sara Ferguson

wanderlust.text: Didn't know where I was going. Didn't care where I ended up. I knew I'd be okay though.
wanderlust.author: Darnell Lamont Walker

wanderlust.text: Life's trials will test you, and shape you, but don’t let them change who you are.”~ Aaron Lauritsen, ‘100 Days Drive.
wanderlust.author: Aaron Lauritsen

wanderlust.text: It was the inverse of an island in the sea.
wanderlust.author: Elisabeth Eaves

wanderlust.text: All night, after the exhausting games of canasta, we would look over the immense sea, full of white-flecked and green reflections, the two of us leaning side by side on the railing, each of us far away, flying in his own aircraft to the stratospheric regions of his own dreams. There we understood that our vocation, our true vocation, was to move for eternity along the roads and seas of the world. Always curious, looking into everything that came before our eyes, sniffing out each corner but only ever faintly--not setting down roots in any land or staying long enough to see the substratum of things the outer limits would suffice.
wanderlust.author: Ernesto Che Guevara

wanderlust.text: I am an artist, my hair is rarely tamed & sometimes I sleep till noon, My house is messy and I speak to the moon. I care less about the materials that I share with my world and more about the passion inside myself. I'm an artist, what more can you expect? I am full of soul, love and all the rest.
wanderlust.author: Nikki Rowe

wanderlust.text: Alone in the car with my social life all before and behind me, I was suspended in the beautiful solitude of the open road, in a kind of introspection that only outdoor space generates, for inside and outside are more intertwined than the usual distinctions allow. The emotion stirred by the landscape is piercing, a joy close to pain when the blue is deepest on the horizon or the clouds are doing those spectacular fleeting things so much easier to recall than to describe.
wanderlust.author: Rebecca Solnit

wanderlust.text: You can’t make a small world for yourself, because what are you going to do when that small world implodes?
wanderlust.author: S.R. Crawford

wanderlust.text: One soft humid early spring morning driving a winding road across Mount Tamalpais, the 2,500-foot mountain just north of the Golden Gate Bridge, a bend reveals a sudden vision of San Francisco in shades of blue, a city in a dream, and I was filled with a tremendous yearning to live in that place of blue hills and blue buildings, though I do live there, I had just left there after breakfast.
wanderlust.author: Rebecca Solnit

wanderlust.text: The beauty he saw in her was the beauty she forgot to see in herself and what a beautiful reminder, that love is what will see us all through.
wanderlust.author: Nikki Rowe

wanderlust.text: We are all pilgrims who seek Italy.
wanderlust.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

wanderlust.text: Everytime I share Jesus Christ, I feel like a superhero!
wanderlust.author: Jane Bulos

wanderlust.text: From this point forward, you don’t even know how to quit in life.”~ Aaron Lauritsen, ‘100 Days Drive.
wanderlust.author: Aaron Lauritsen

motivational.text: With every step we take we have a choice to make. Our choices determine our actions. Our actions determine who we are.
motivational.author: Randall Marr

motivational.text: Awake! Arise! The hour is late! Angels are knocking at thy door!They are in haste and cannot wait, And once departed come no more.Awake! Arise! The athlete's arm Loses its strength by too much rest;The fallow land, the untilled farm Produces only weeds at best.
motivational.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

motivational.text: We have to do what is right, not what is easy nor what is popular.
motivational.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivational.text: GOD is like a streetlight. He keeps observing you silently when it is light and showers you with light when you are in darkness!
motivational.author: Uma Shanker

motivational.text: You never know what people have endured to get where they are.
motivational.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

motivational.text: Take all of your wasted honorEvery little past frustrationTake all of your so-called problems,Better put 'em in quotations.
motivational.author: John Mayer

motivational.text: Forgiving yourself, believing in yourself and choosing to love yourself are the best gifts one could receive.
motivational.author: Brittany Burgunder

motivational.text: Success sits on a mountain of mistakes.
motivational.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

motivational.text: Then holding the star aloft and the bright sword advanced, Frodo, hobbit of the Shire, walked steadily down to meet the eyes.
motivational.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

motivational.text: The strength of the spirit sustains the soul.
motivational.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

motivational.text: The gift of the moments and its lessons prepares us for a better tomorrow.
motivational.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

motivational.text: The single greatest cause of happiness is gratitude.
motivational.author: Auliq-Ice

motivational.text: Let someone else be the most powerful country, make ours the most peaceful country.
motivational.author: Amit Kalantri

motivational.text: You will need to know when to be assertive and wise enough to know when to exercise patience.
motivational.author: Julian Pencilliah

motivational.text: Your money is just a condition to get my business, your professionalism is the price.
motivational.author: Amit Kalantri

motivational.text: It's okay to be nervous, scared, angry or sad sometimes so long as you don't let those emotions rule your entire life.
motivational.author: Avina Celeste

motivational.text: The beauty of today may not be realised until it becomes tomorrow’s memory.
motivational.author: Steven Aitchison

motivational.text: Its not about reaching a Peak but to develop an attitude of discovering new Peaks in Life!
motivational.author: Harrish Sairaman

motivational.text: Stop changing yourself for the sake of other people. You shouldn't care what strangers think and true friends won't ask you to change.
motivational.author: Avina Celeste

motivational.text: Holding on, holding out and holding fast when the going is tough constitutes a winning mindset.
motivational.author: Ogwo David Emenike

motivational.text: Who said I won't fail? I might. Who said I might give up? I won't.
motivational.author: Vikrmn

motivational.text: Data has no ego and makes an excellent co-pilot.
motivational.author: Jay Samit

motivational.text: When you need motivation, look no where! Just say 'YES, I CAN DO IT.
motivational.author: Mohith Agadi

motivational.text: When a lion kills a deer it does not build negative KARMA, its meant that way!!!!
motivational.author: Harrish Sairaman

motivational.text: To become a better you, remember to be grateful to people who have contributed to making you who you are today.
motivational.author: Israelmore Ayivor

love.text: I turn my head so that he doesn't see my smile and secretly curse him for making me feel special.
love.author: Kasie West

love.text: And then there will be the times when I see you laughing. Like the time you’ll be playing with the neighbor’s puppy, poking your hands through the chain-link fence separating our back yards, and you’ll be laughing so hard you’ll start hiccupping. The puppy will run inside the neighbor’s house, and your laughter will gradually subside, letting you catch your breath. Then the puppy will come back to the fence to lick your fingers again, and you’ll shriek and start laughing again. It will be the most wonderful sound I could ever imagine, a sound that makes me feel like a fountain, or a wellspring.
love.author: Ted Chiang

love.text: She was learning something important: how to live within the sound of her own slow breathing, how to love the view when her eyes were shut.
love.author: Gwendoline Riley

love.text: Why fight to the death when we can love eachother to death?
love.author: Sigurd Bache Hungnes

love.text: Cassia.I know which life is my real one now, no matter what happens. It’s the one with you. For some reason, knowing that even one person knows my story makes things different. Maybe it’s like the poem says. Maybe this is my way of not going gentle.I love you. (Ky Markham).
love.author: Ally Condie

love.text: My eyes fall on you like a singing veil from the days of rebirth.
love.author: Kristian Goldmund Aumann

love.text: We have to consciously study how to be tender with each other until it becomes a habit because what was native has been stolen from us, the love of Black women for each other.
love.author: Audre Lorde

love.text: Mindfulness & Meditation help focus on the moment while at the same time knowing we cannot capture that moment, we are in a flow of moments we let flow. We can watch moments in detail without being attached to them. Non-attachment to past & future stems from this practice. Worry about past or future is wasted energy, however we can observe the past & learn from it without agonising over it & trust ourselves to handle the future better. We can celebrate the opportunity to grow as we gain understanding from observation & experience. We can watch ourselves & avoid being caught up in over-reactions. 'I am loved, right now, in this moment, I love, and am part of love itself. I am aware of myself at every level - the mental slowing gracefully to sense the spiritual within & all around, and the physical being still, or moving. I tune in to the flow of life in my body & the flow of life everywhere. I circulate love with each breath - from without to within & from within to all around.
love.author: Jay Woodman

love.text: He had become enveloped in the Indian Summer of the Soul.
love.author: O. Henry

love.text: A great giftwe can giveto ourselvesis a willingnessto love everyone,no matter what.This frees us completely from the toxicjustificationswe use to hate.
love.author: Scott Stabile

love.text: They’re scared of the other kind of love. The one which lacks hurt, but pains after awhile.
love.author: Dominic Riccitello

love.text: It is well to believe that there needs but a little more thought, a little more courage, more love, more devotion to life, a little more eagerness, one day to fling open wide the portals of joy and of truth.
love.author: Maurice Maeterlinck

love.text: Love them that hate you, but you can't love them whom you hate.
love.author: Leo Tolstoy

love.text: I laughed as we turned in a tight circle... 'Tonight you're all mine.'Jake smiled but looked me dead in the eye. 'No. From now on.'My heart skipped. 'What?'Yours,' he said simply, 'from now on.
love.author: Kieran Scott

love.text: Love is selfish yet a selfless feeling.
love.author: Heenashree Khandelwal

love.text: Your mind is the most powerful magnet. What you think, you attract.
love.author: Debasish Mridha

love.text: It hasn't been just a weekend for me, Wilson. I've wanted you for so long. I fought off the thoughts every day, exhausting every option to keep you off my mind; I can't do it anymore. I want you right here.
love.author: Gretchen de la O

love.text: We want to be women who advance. The kingdom of God is advancing, and the gates of hell will not prevail against it. Don't you want to advance along with it? Don't you want to help it to advance? And don't you want to advance into the deeper realms of the heart of God? Advance into more healing, more deliverance, more intimacy, more life? Fear makes us retreat. Love causes it to advance.
love.author: Stasi Eldredge

love.text: ...You do yourself no favour if you let your sense of doubt-mistrust-scepticism to rise up within you to the point where you must look every gift horse in the mouth...
love.author: Isabella koldras

love.text: They did not use the sonic stunners but the foray gun, the ancient weapon that fires a set of metal fragments in a burst. They shot to kill him. He was dying when I got to him, sprawled and twisted away from his skis that stuck up out of the snow, his chest half shot away. I took his head in my arms and spoke to him, but he never answered me; only in a way he answered my love for him, crying out through the silent wreck and tumult of his mind as consciousness lapsed, in the unspoken tongue, once, clearly, 'Arek!' Then no more. I held him, crouching there in the snow, while he died. They let me do that. Then they made me get up, and took me off one way and him another, I going to prison and he into the dark.
love.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

happiness.text: Happiness is the interval between periods of unhappiness.
happiness.author: Don Marquis

happiness.text: Seeking external validation brings disappointment. Validate yourself from within to find true happiness.
happiness.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

happiness.text: Five minutes after something happened might not be the best time for you to get into your Facebook and tell everybody. Men's panic does not produce God's power.
happiness.author: Patience Johnson

happiness.text: And then there will be the times when I see you laughing. Like the time you’ll be playing with the neighbor’s puppy, poking your hands through the chain-link fence separating our back yards, and you’ll be laughing so hard you’ll start hiccupping. The puppy will run inside the neighbor’s house, and your laughter will gradually subside, letting you catch your breath. Then the puppy will come back to the fence to lick your fingers again, and you’ll shriek and start laughing again. It will be the most wonderful sound I could ever imagine, a sound that makes me feel like a fountain, or a wellspring.
happiness.author: Ted Chiang

happiness.text: We cannot really love anybody with whom we never laugh.
happiness.author: Agnes Repplier

happiness.text: It is painful those feelings of pain,but accept it with love to see the gain.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: When my mother didn't come back I realized that any moment could be the last. Nothing in life should simply be a passage from one place to another. Each walk should be taken as if it is the only thing you have left. You can demand something like this of yourself as an unattainable ideal. After that, you have to remind yourself about it every time you're sloppy about something. For me that means 250 times a day.
happiness.author: Peter Høeg

happiness.text: To promote peace, promote understanding. To promote understanding, promote love.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: No one is to blame because there is no one other than you. Nothing is to disrespect because there is nothing other than you.
happiness.author: Amit Ray

happiness.text: Sometimes I get so sad that it jest sounds good.
happiness.author: Abbi Glines

happiness.text: The best thing you can do for yourself if you wish to see your dreams become reality is to find success and replicate it.
happiness.author: Mensah Oteh

happiness.text: People who have wellbeing and feel fulfilled, need far less than people who feel unfulfilled, who always seem to need more.' By Rethinking Your Mindset you can create SWIFT sustainable success.
happiness.author: Tony Dovale

happiness.text: I like to believe that you don't need to reach a certain goal to be happy. I prefer to think that happiness is always there, and that when things don't go the way we might like them to, it's a sign from above that something even better is right around the corner.
happiness.author: David Archuleta

happiness.text: Your mind is the most powerful magnet. What you think, you attract.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: Democracy is probably the only discovery by mankind which mostly brought it only happiness.
happiness.author: Amit Kalantri

happiness.text: When you are in doubt and lost, to find the way, chose love.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: Sorcha took the elevator down to the basement of the fashion house. She glanced at her stunningly beautiful reflection in the mirror and smiled to herself. How fortunate she was to be a vampire - no gray hairs, no wrinkles, no broken nails, no weight problems, and no PMT. What bliss! And how fortunate it was that all the legends about vampires were not true. She could not imagine an existence where she could not see and admire her own likeness - such a life to her would be intolerable and tedious. How could any female, even a vampire, survive without being able to see their own reflection? How could they do their hair and makeup? The very idea was totally preposterous.
happiness.author: Alan Kinross

happiness.text: When you are focused on what you're doing, you are not going to miss the next opportunity ... It's more likely that you get more!
happiness.author: Stephen Richards

happiness.text: The magic of love is that it becomes our memory which we never can forget.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: Happiness is in our own hearts. I have no regrets of anything in the past. I'm totally cheerful and happy, and I think that a lot of your attitude is not in the circumstances you find yourself in, but in the circumstances you make for yourself.
happiness.author: Maeve Binchy

happiness.text: The single greatest cause of happiness is gratitude.
happiness.author: Auliq-Ice

happiness.text: An ounce of joy is the equivalent of a ton of happiness.
happiness.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

happiness.text: Manifest kindness to embrace greatness.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: All in good time is something Cosmic Ordering does not follow.
happiness.author: Stephen Richards

happiness.text: It is indisputable that the being whose capacities of enjoyment are low, has the greatest chance of having them fully satisfied; and a highly endowed being will always feel that any happiness which he can look for, as the world is constituted, is imperfect. But he can learn to bear its imperfections, if they are at all bearable; and they will not make him envy the being who is indeed unconscious of the imperfections, but only because he feels not at all the good which those imperfections qualify.  Dissatisfied than a fool satisfied. And if the fool, or the pig, is of a different opinion, it is only because they only know their own side of the question.
happiness.author: John Stuart Mill

happiness.text: Love is the moonlight when the moon is your heart.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: Happiness is not always a reality many times it is in our memory.
happiness.author: Hockson Floin

happiness.text: Happiness is an awareness—a blissful perception, not in ownership or in material possessions.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: I don’t remember now who took the photo of us, but I’ve had it in my room for years. We’re leaning out of our windows and we’re laughing at each other with joyfulness purer than anything to do with the polite smiling you get used to doing when you get older. The photo has the kind of proper smiles that happen when you’re looking straight into the face of someone who’s been your best friend for a long time.
happiness.author: Sarah Moore Fitzgerald

positive.text: I believe in the power of love, and planting positive thought seeds into the collective consciousness.
positive.author: Jay Woodman

positive.text: We can only reach the highest height, if we encourage each other.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Without an anchor, we can be drifted to any shore. May you find hope as anchor.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Thank God for allowing you to see another day. No matter what, keep trusting, keep believing, be strong, have hope. The best is yet to come.
positive.author: Germany Kent

positive.text: God has given every man, 120 years of life on earth. It is yours to possess.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: When a fire rises, don't be quick to worry. Find the purpose of the fire, if it's negative, water it down, if positive, feed the flames.
positive.author: Travis J. Dahnke

positive.text: You don’t have to wait for a storm to pass to paint your own rainbow.
positive.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

positive.text: I think a lot of times we don't pay enough attention to people with a positive attitude because we assume they are naive or stupid or unschooled.
positive.author: Amy Adams

positive.text: Your traditional EDUCATION is not going to CHANGE your life but the life you are experiencing that can change you. Choose a POSITIVE life STYLE with positive ATTITUDE which could bring you a life with HAPPINESS and WISDOM.
positive.author: Rashedur Ryan Rahman

positive.text: Don’t believe negative voices. Listen to the divine-instinct of awaken soul.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: The purpose of any healthy relationship is to find someone that will magnify your life's experiences, not tolerate it or become a spectator of it.
positive.author: Shannon L. Alder

positive.text: Dwell on positive thoughts!
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Don’t be a victim of circumstances. Choose victory by gracious endurance.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Not every problem can be solved. Some are okay simply to avoid. Go around the, go under them, whatever it takes to reach your higher goal. Sometimes you have to fail your way to success.
positive.author: Anna Mitchael

positive.text: You have the power to realise your dream. If only you are willing and determined.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Be grateful for the day and the day will be grateful for you. Stay positive and everything around you will respond in kind.
positive.author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

positive.text: THE FOUR HEAVENLY FOUNTAINSLaugh, I tell youAnd you will turn backThe hands of time.Smile, I tell youAnd you will reflectThe face of the divine.Sing, I tell youAnd all the angels will sing with you!Cry, I tell youAnd the reflections found in your pool of tears -Will remind you of the lessons of today and yesterdayTo guide you through the fears of tomorrow.
positive.author: Suzy Kassem

positive.text: The science of psychology has been far more successful on the negative than on the positive side... It has revealed to us much about man's shortcomings, his illnesses, his sins, but little about his potentialities, his virtues, his achievable aspirations, or his psychological health.
positive.author: Abraham Maslow

positive.text: It isn't our position  but our disposition  that makes us happy.
positive.author: Anonymous

positive.text: Don't make noise, rather give people good reasons to make noise about you.
positive.author: Unarine Ramaru

positive.text: By nature, I'm a very positive person, and because I'm happy in myself, and in my life, and I've got a great husband, and beautiful children, and I have a job that I love that calls for a certain amount of emotional expression, I get to realise a lot of my dreams and aspirations.
positive.author: Kate Winslet

positive.text: I will sacrifice today for tomorrow.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: The greater part of our happiness or misery depends on our dispositions  and not our circumstances.
positive.author: Martha Washington

positive.text: My hope fuels my determination to overcome any difficulty.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: When I was eight, my piano teacher played seven or eight notes, and I sang them. She stopped and looked at me in shock! That was the first time I'd gotten that reaction. I'd had looks of horror, but never shock in a positive way.
positive.author: Chris Cornell

positive.text: When God gives you an idea, you must act immediately on it.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: You can do it. Go ahead and pursue your dreams.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Focus on your goals, not your fear. Focus like a laser beam on your goals.
positive.author: Roy T. Bennett

positive.text: Take each day in your open palms and close your fists around it. This life is not done with you yet.
positive.author: D. Antoinette Foy

strength.text: I hope we shall crush in its birth the aristocracy of our monied corporations which dare already to challenge our government to a trial by strength, and bid defiance to the laws of our country.
strength.author: Thomas Jefferson

strength.text: Whenever I am sad and depressed; whenever I cry tears of pain or frustration I ask my little heart, why do I cry. Why does this emotion overtake me time and again. Then a little voice from within say that it’s OK to cry once in a while. If you’ve been hurt, it’s better to cry yourself to calmness, to console yourself instead of retaliating. These tears make me human instead of becoming a hard hearted person. Tears retain the innocent being within me. So tears are my biggest strength, they are my best friends….
strength.author: Latika Teotia

strength.text: Endure despite the pain. The key is grace of strength.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: Man's delight in the Lord is the absolute peak of human triumph. He praises God when full of joy, and when not, he praises God to become full of joy. For to know and to live as though God is worthy of all praise, in all one's circumstances, whether seemingly good or seemingly bad, is the primary definition of joy and the richest triumph for man under God.
strength.author: Criss Jami

strength.text: We think we are so strong but it is only when others try to prey on our weaknesses that we realize how frail we truly are.”-Skyla (from Twiceborn).
strength.author: JP Robinson

strength.text: The strength of the spirit sustains the soul.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: It's her ability as an artist to see possibility where others see a blank page and, by extension, to see victory where others see certain defeat that truly empowers her...
strength.author: Sarah Cross

strength.text: To fall down is to face the weakness of my humanity, test the mettle of my character, and push the limits of my strength. Therefore, falling down will tell me who I am far more clearly than most things I might learn when I’m standing up.
strength.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

strength.text: Cassia.I know which life is my real one now, no matter what happens. It’s the one with you. For some reason, knowing that even one person knows my story makes things different. Maybe it’s like the poem says. Maybe this is my way of not going gentle.I love you. (Ky Markham).
strength.author: Ally Condie

strength.text: Femininity is not just lipstick, stylish hairdos, and trendy clothes. It is the divine adornment of humanity. It finds expression in your qualities of your capacity to love, your spirituality, delicacy, radiance, sensitivity, creativity, charm, graciousness, gentleness, dignity, and quiet strength.
strength.author: James E. Faust

strength.text: For the weakest has but to try his strength to find it, and then he shall be strong.
strength.author: Robin Hobb

strength.text: Sometimes you just have to die a little inside in order to be reborn and rise again as a stronger and wiser version of you..!!
strength.author: Aagam Shah

strength.text: In the depth of winter, I finally learned that within me there lay an invincible summer.
strength.author: Albert Camus

strength.text: Thank God for the grace to work.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: Please hear me, you are not alone on this planet hurtling through space, solitude is an illusion, come let me help you, rise up, walk forward, walk tall, walk straight, let nothing stop you.
strength.author: Danny Scheinmann

strength.text: No struggle, no success! The strongest thunder strikes often bring the heaviest rainfall! The weight of your fulfillment depends on how wide you cast your nets!
strength.author: Israelmore Ayivor

strength.text: Strength is not defined by the load you bear, it’s defined by the amount you can bend before breaking.
strength.author: Blake Mays

strength.text: People with vision sees opportunity where there is problem. They see money not problem.
strength.author: Patience Johnson

strength.text: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
strength.author: Mahatma Gandhi

strength.text: We can only reach the highest height, if we encourage each other.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: If You Love me..--Your love drove metowards the live volcanowhere I will be burnt and destroyedOn your fake promises I made castles on air Oh! ! ! I was throwingsome pearls in desertwhere oasis has value Pearls have no value just remember I am an oceanyou are only a boat for a boat to explore oceanlove need to be daring, desperate If You love mePlant a seed of truthmake me part of your missingJust If you Love me.........
strength.author: Seema Gupta

strength.text: Instead of being frustrated by adversity, our mind focuses on the adventure of creativity with our thoughts. What a glorious paradise?
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: The glorious presence of God is with us. Let us rise in mighty strength to build the nation.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: Recovery itself is a very un-glamorous daily process of being willing to fall down again, to break again, to cry again, to get up and try yet again until ‘success’ manifests as ever-greater sustained healing.
strength.author: Shannon Cutts

strength.text: The greatest strength are rooted in love, joy, peace, patient, kindness, goodness, faithfulness, gentleness and self control.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: ...Whatever happens I'll not be afraid again; for, when you've once pushed through the place of torment to the peace beyond, you know that you can do it again. You know there's a strength somewhere that you can call upon. You've confidence.
strength.author: Elizabeth Goudge

strength.text: Luck is for those with nothing else. I wish you strength and courage.
strength.author: Annette Marie

strength.text: We write to strengthen our soul and the spirit of other souls.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: God doesn't mock us. He never gives us a goal that we cannot accomplish in His strength. I want to assure you, you can glorify God, you MUST glorify God. But you have to determine deep within your heart that you're going to do it His way.
strength.author: Charles R. Swindoll

strength.text: But we are strong, each in our purpose, and we are all more strong together.
strength.author: Bram Stoker
